mapper.insert: insert into erp_board(writer, subject, content, readcount, writeday, delim) values(#{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now(), 2)
mapper.update: update erp_board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from erp_board where delim = 2
select * from erp_board where delim=2 order by writeday desc limit #{start} , #{perpage}
